scripts.front-end:deploy: cd udagram-frontend && npm run deploy && cd ..
scripts.set-eb-env: eb use udagram-env  && eb setenv AWS_BUCKET=$AWS_BUCKET && eb setenv POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME && eb setenv POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD && eb setenv POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST && eb setenv POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB
scripts.deploy: npm run front-end:deploy && npm run set-eb-env && npm run back-end:deploy
